text: Adan Canto (5 December 1981 â€“ 8 January 2024) was a Mexican actor. He played Sunspot in the 2014 superhero movie X-Men: Days of Future Past, Paul Torres on the Fox drama series The Following, and AJ Menendez in the ABC prime-time series Blood & Oil. He also played Rodrigo Lara Bonilla in the Netflix drama series Narcos and Aaron Shore in the ABC/Netflix political drama Designated Survivor.
